EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_PCF Roadshow_Q314 - Q115.Invite - Minneapolis
EmailTemplate.subject: You're Invited: Pivotal Cloud Platform Roadshow - Minneapolis
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://pivotal.io>
<http://www.pivotal.io/cloud-platform-roadshow/minneapolis?utm_source=email&utm_medium=pivotal-email-link&utm_campaign=paas-pcp-roadshow>
Join Pivotal technologists and learn how to build and deploy great software on a modern cloud platform.
At this workshop, you’ll get hands-on experience as you test drive Pivotal’s CF platform. In just a few hours, you’ll realize the speed and ease of pushing an application on Pivotal CF.
Who Should Attend The workshops cover topics of interest to developers, architects, operations and technical managers. The keynotes set the stage for the workshops and will provide valuable insights for all.
AGENDA
8:00 AM – 9:00 AM Registration & Breakfast
9:00 AM – 10:00 AM Keynote: Software Kept Eating the World
10:00 AM – 10:15 AM Coffee Break
10:15 AM – 11:30 AM Session #1: The Developer Experience
11:30 AM – 11:45 AM Coffee Break
11:45 AM – 1:00 PM Session #2 - Architecture & Operations
1:00 PM – 2:30 PM Lunch & Afternoon Keynote: Continuous Delivery & Microservices
2:30 PM – 2:45 PM Coffee Break
2:45 PM – 4:00 PM Session #3 - Enabling Continuous Delivery
4:00 PM – 4:15 PM Coffee Break
4:15 PM – 5:30 PM Session #4 - Custom Buildpacks & Data Services
Register <http://www.pivotal.io/cloud-platform-roadshow/minneapolis?utm_source=email&utm_medium=pivotal-email-link&utm_campaign=paas-pcp-roadshow> now for this exclusive event. The workshop is FREE; space is limited.
THURSDAY October 2, 2014 Sheraton Bloomington Hotel 5601 West 78th Street Minneapolis, MN 55439
REGISTER <http://www.pivotal.io/cloud-platform-roadshow/minneapolis?utm_source=email&utm_medium=pivotal-email-link&utm_campaign=paas-pcp-roadshow>
KEYNOTE PRESENTER Ian Andrews Director - Advanced Technology Group
www.pivotal.io <http://pivotal.io>
<https://twitter.com/pivotal> <http://www.linkedin.com/company/3048967> <https://www.facebook.com/pivotalsoftware> <https://plus.google.com/105320112436428794490/posts> <http://www.youtube.com/gopivotal>
Pivotal <http://pivotal.io>, committed to open source and open standards, is a leading provider of application and data infrastructure software, agile development services, and data science consulting. Pivotal's revolutionary Enterprise PaaS product, Pivotal CF, powered by Cloud Foundry, is available now.
